intro: Uncover Blackrock Manor’s fortune and the truth behind the family deaths.
description:
After the mysterious deaths of his three children, Augustus Blackrock hid his fortune so no one could claim it. But was that his only secret? What really happened to the Blackrock family?

EXPLORE THE MANOR
Search every corner of the eerie Blackrock Manor in pursuit of its hidden fortune.

SOLVE PUZZLES
Observe, think, and connect clues to solve the eight escape rooms within the manor. Every object could be a hint. Keep your eyes open!

UNCOVER THE TRUTH
Discover what became of the Blackrock family and where Augustus’s treasure lies.

FEATURES
*Eight escape rooms filled with puzzles
*Stylized environments
*An intriguing story
